description.title: Estimate Documentation and Estimator Training
description.text: Engineering Business Center provides services for preparing estimate documentation, estimate maintenance for construction companies in terms of preparing reporting documentation, and educational services for individual, corporate, remote, and group training in estimate work.

estimateService.title: Estimate Maintenance
content: Preparation of local estimates for general construction and special types of works
Preparation of work completion certificates for construction and other special installation works according to forms approved by the Ministry of Architecture and Construction (C-2a, C-2b)
Preparation of statements on the cost of completed works and expenses (C-3, C-3a)
Preparation of certificates for additional works

Recalculation of work completion certificates when changing design solutions, in case of adjustment of work volumes and expenses, adjustment of construction estimate cost and re-approval of estimate documentation when passing repeated state expertise

Preparation of various forms of accounting documents in construction (C-4, C-7, C-14, C-23), defect statements (C-1) and preparation of report on construction materials consumption in comparison with production standards (C-29)
Preparation of construction contracts, work production and financing schedules, additional agreements, protocols of disagreements
Consulting services on estimate pricing within estimate maintenance

currentRepair.title: Current Repair
content: Preparation of defect certificates
Calculation of repair works cost
Preparation of estimates for current repair
Consultations on repair works
Form C-1 "Defect Certificate" is subject to application by organizations regardless of organizational and legal form and form of ownership and individual entrepreneurs

Form C-1 is used by organizations to justify the decision to conduct current repair and serves as the initial document for preparing estimates for construction and installation works for current repair

In the corresponding lines of Form C-1, information about constrained and complicated conditions of work production and features of work technology using lifting mechanisms, electric cradles, aerial platforms and other information necessary for determining the estimate cost of works is provided in arbitrary form
Approximate (enlarged) list of types of expected construction and installation works is indicated in Form C-1 and is prepared based on the results of initial inspection of the repair object

estimateDocs.title: Estimate Documentation
estimateDocs.description: Preparation of estimate documentation for project sections
content: Engineering Business Center offers services for preparing a complete set of estimate documentation at different design stages (at the architectural project stage, at the construction project stage) for all project sections:
Cost summary;
Summary estimate calculation of construction cost;
Object estimates;

Local estimates for individual types of works: for construction and special works, internal sanitary and technical works (water supply, sewerage, heating, ventilation, air conditioning), internal telephony, radio, gasification, television networks, internal electric lighting, power installations, technological and other types of equipment, control and measuring instruments and automation, automated control system, vertical planning, engineering networks installation, landscaping and other works.
Statements of work volumes and resource consumption and resource statements.

contractPrice.title: Contract Price Calculation
contractPrice.description: Contract price calculation for negotiations or tenders
content: When forming a competitive proposal for participation in negotiations or tenders for the selection of a general contractor or subcontractor, it is necessary to calculate the contract (contract) price - the estimate cost of construction of the facility or performance of construction works.

When forming an unchanged contract price, it is necessary to take into account the conditions of the competitive task (documentation) for negotiations or tenders, conditions provided for by the design documentation, rules for forming the estimate cost of construction, as well as to think through which cost items to reduce the estimate cost, in case it is planned to be reduced.

The rules for forming an unchanged contract price are regulated by the Regulation on the procedure for forming an unchanged contract (contract) price for construction of facilities, approved by the Resolution of the Council of Ministers of the Republic of Belarus dated 18.11.2011 No. 1553.

The estimate cost of construction is formed in current prices, taking into account all circumstances under which the construction of the facility will be carried out, taking into account the standard construction period. Cases of changing the contract price are limited by legislation, and therefore it is important to think through all points when forming it. In conditions of fierce competition in the construction market, as a rule, it is necessary to reduce the cost of construction of the facility in order to win tenders and conclude a construction contract.

Currently, many different competitions, negotiations and tenders are held, and one of the main criteria for evaluating competitive proposals is - price. Other criteria, such as terms, payment conditions, warranty period and others have less weight.
We offer services for calculating an unchanged contract (contract) price:
contract price for participation in negotiations or tenders - the price of the contractor's (subcontractor's) proposal;
contract price for concluding a construction contract;
contract price - the customer's starting price.

The initial data for forming unchanged contract (contract) prices is the design, including estimate documentation, in case of participation in negotiations or tenders, competitive documentation, and in case of reducing the estimate cost of the facility compared to the design and estimate documentation, technical task for calculating the contract (contract) price with information about the cost of materials, products and structures, machines, mechanisms and planned measures to reduce the cost of construction works. The estimate documentation is provided in electronic format, allowing to load the estimate documentation for the facility into the estimate program. The calculation of the unchanged contract (contract) price is carried out according to PTM, which allows further formation of work completion certificates according to form C-2b.

contracts.title: Contract Preparation
contracts.description: Preparation of contracts and their appendices
content: The construction contract regulates the relationship between the customer and the contractor when performing construction or installation works. It fixes key conditions: subject of works, terms, cost, payment procedure and acceptance.

The contract conclusion procedure includes development of work and payment schedules, distribution of responsibilities for design documentation and, if necessary, involvement of subcontractors. The contract may include provisions on warranty periods, intermediate stages, advances and other features.
The document may be changed or terminated by agreement of the parties, and arising disputes are resolved through negotiations.

reporting.title: Reporting Documentation
reporting.description: Preparation of reporting documentation - work completion certificates, statements, additional works
content: ⚖️ Why is it important to properly prepare primary documents?

According to Article 10 of the Law of the Republic of Belarus dated 12.07.2013 No. 57-Z "On Accounting and Reporting" (as amended on 17.07.2017), any business transaction must be confirmed by a primary accounting document.

📌 For construction and installation works, such documents are work completion certificates. They confirm the fact of work performance, their volume, cost and are the basis for reflection in accounting both for the contractor and the customer.
📝 What must be in primary documents:
document name and date of preparation;
name of the organization or individual entrepreneur participating in the operation;
description and basis of the business operation, its assessment in natural and monetary units;
positions, surnames and signatures of responsible persons.
📄 Preparation of work completion certificates

When the contractor transfers completed construction works and their acceptance by the customer, a certificate is drawn up, which is signed by both parties. This is provided for by paragraph 64 of Rules No. 1450.
Certificates are prepared on the basis of Instruction No. 29, approved by Resolution of Minarchitect RB dated 20.07.2018 No. 29 (as amended on 27.05.2021), and contain:
name,
volume (in natural units),
cost of completed works.
📚 Legislative basis

Forms of primary accounting documents, including work completion certificates, are approved by Resolution of the Ministry of Architecture and Construction of RB dated 29.04.2011 No. 13 (as amended on 27.05.2021).
📌 Why this is important:
Proper preparation of primary documents is not only a requirement of the law, but also a guarantee of:
proper accounting;
absence of claims during inspections;
transparency of settlements between parties.

localEstimates.title: Local Estimates
localEstimates.description: Preparation of local estimates for general construction and special works
content: We develop local estimates for the following types of works:
Construction and special works,
Internal sanitary and technical works (water supply, sewerage, heating, ventilation, air conditioning),
Internal telephony, radio, gasification, television networks,
Internal electric lighting,
Power installations,
Technological and other types of equipment,
Control and measuring instruments and automation,
Automated control system,
Vertical planning,
Engineering networks installation,
Landscaping and other works.
We offer services for preparing estimate documentation for various types of works and according to the agreed list of services:

Preparation of local estimates for general construction and special types of works according to defect statement, work volume statement, customer's technical task, room finishing statement and design project;
Preparation of estimates for individual project sections (working drawings);
Preparation of estimates for commissioning works;
Preparation of estimate for bank to obtain a loan;
Preparation of estimate documentation during construction of an individual residential house for construction control;
Restoration of estimates and cumulative work volume statement according to customer's data;
Adjustment of work volumes and expenses in estimates when changing design solutions;
Checking the validity of including expenses in the estimate, correctness of applying rates;
Checking work volumes in estimates for compliance with design solutions (working drawings) and fact;
Optimization of estimates and expenses in estimate documentation in order to prepare estimates for the amount determined by the Customer.

consulting.title: Consulting Services
consulting.description: Consulting services in estimate work and pricing
content: We will help you competently prepare estimates, optimize costs and avoid unnecessary expenses.
We work according to the current regulatory framework, we will tell you how to properly prepare documents and calculate the cost of works.
Save time, reduce risks and make informed decisions with expert support.

selfService.title: Self-Service Estimates
selfService.description: Preparation of estimate documentation for organizations performing works with their own resources
content: Self-service construction is an organizational form of construction in which construction and installation works are performed by the developer's own resources, who has the right of ownership, economic management, operational management of the construction facility (part of the facility) or acquires this right upon completion of construction. In case of construction with the involvement of contracting organizations, self-service construction includes that part of the works that is performed by the developer's own resources.
Expenses for performing works by self-service are reflected by the developer in accounting in the established manner.
Based on actual construction expenses, the cost of the construction facility is formed.
For registration of works performed by self-service, certificate form C-2a and statement of actual expenses are prepared.

items.name: Estimate Maintenance (PROGRAM 1)
items.description: calculation of contract price for concluding a construction contract and for participation in tenders or negotiations, preparation of estimate documentation, reporting documentation for completed works according to agreed list up to 3 facilities.

items.name: Estimate Maintenance (PROGRAM 2)
items.description: calculation of contract price for concluding a construction contract and for participation in tenders or negotiations, preparation of estimate documentation, reporting documentation for completed works according to agreed list from 3 facilities.

items.name: Estimate Maintenance (PAYMENT BY FACT)
items.description: subscription estimate maintenance based on actually processed hours according to agreed list: calculation of contract price for concluding a construction contract and for participation in tenders or negotiations, preparation of estimate documentation, reporting documentation.

sections.title: 1. Brief Overview
